description.@en: You are able to call forth strange, eerie powers from beyond the Ã†ther. Although you do not have a true understanding of where they come from, you pay tribute to older gods nonetheless for such miracles.

effect.@en: Select any one Generalist Magick spell (providing that it does not cause harm to another). When you attempt to cast this Magick, you do not need to roll percentile dice to make a Skill Test. Instead, you Critically Succeed at the Incantation Test you intended to make. Furthermore, you may select one additional Generalist Magick spell at both Intermediate and Advanced Tier with the aforementioned limitations.
